name: TheAdviceMachine
0:
”Alexa, open The Advice Machine”
”Alexa, start The Advice Machine”
”Alexa, launch The Advice Machine”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the advice machine
des:
The Advice Machine is a skill The Advice Machine is a skill that offers short pieces of practical advice. The skill simulates a penny arcade machine that you insert coins into and a slip containing pithy advice is dispensed.

You can say:

"Alexa, open The Advice Machine"
"Alexa, start The Advice Machine"
"Alexa, launch The Advice Machine"
